org.apache.jmeter.threads.RemoteThreadsListenerImpl
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable, Remote, ThreadListener, RemoteThreadsListener
public class RemoteThreadsListenerImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RemoteThreadsListener, ThreadListener
RMI Implementation, client side code (ie executed on Controller)

2.10

  • 方法详细资料

    • threadStarted

      public void threadStarted()
      从接口复制的说明: ThreadListener
      Called for each thread before starting sampling. WARNING: this is called before any Config test elements are processed, so any properties they define will not have been merged in yet. See org.apache.jmeter.threads.JMeterThread#threadStarted()
      指定者:
      threadStarted 在接口中 RemoteThreadsListener
      指定者:
      threadStarted 在接口中 ThreadListener
      另请参阅:
      • RemoteThreadsListener.threadStarted()

    • threadFinished

      public void threadFinished()
      从接口复制的说明: ThreadListener
      Called for each thread after all samples have been processed. See org.apache.jmeter.threads.JMeterThread#threadFinished(org.apache.jmeter.engine.event.LoopIterationListener)
      指定者:
      threadFinished 在接口中 RemoteThreadsListener
      指定者:
      threadFinished 在接口中 ThreadListener
      另请参阅:
      • ThreadListener.threadFinished()
